Member Function Documentation

const_char_p* FindUserReplyPacket::getLogonIDs (   )  const
 

Get the users logonIDs.

Returns:
An array with strings pointing into the packet. The array must be deleted by caller but not the strings. The strings are in the Pakcet.

uint32 FindUserReplyPacket::getNbrUsers (   )  const
 

Get the number of Users fiting the fields.

Returns:
The number of users that fits the given fields.

Referenced by AllUserRequest::getNbrUserReplyPacket().

uint32* FindUserReplyPacket::getUINs (   )  const
 

Get the user UINs.

Returns:
The UINs of all the users. The returned array has getNbrUsers elements. Q: Must the returned array be deleted by the caller or not? A: Yes, IT IS A PACKET and it can't store it for you!
